jobs.title: Senior BD Manager (NO RECRUITER)
jobs.description:
Position: Senior BD Manager, London

Reports to: CEO, London

Location: Forward Fooding Innovation Hub, White City, London

(NO RECRUITER)

About Forward Fooding
Forward Fooding is the world’s first collaborative platform for the food and beverage industry. We believe entrepreneurship can make a difference in solving some of biggest issues that are affecting our current food system that’s why at Forward Fooding we are passionate about fostering food innovation by connecting food and foodtech entrepreneurs with the most relevant partners for their ventures. To learn more visit: www.forwardfooding.com

About the role:
There is great potential for personal and professional development for talented and motivated individuals. We’re looking for people who want to be part of Forward Fooding’s next growth chapter as a young and dynamic organization and be part of its exciting future. The company is populated with young and entrepreneurial creative individuals that form the core of our team. We work hard but enjoy our work and find time to make it fun.

What you will be in charge of:

Developing an outstanding strategy to nurture and engage with current and prospective customers of the FoodTech Data Navigator (datanavigator.forwardfooding.com)
Building strong customers' pipeline, prioritise leads and report all information into HubSpot tracker
Turning CRM data into exceptionable insights to approach existing/new leads
Identifying and leveraging new tech tools to increase lead generations
Heading up events & workshops within our Food & FoodTech Innovation Hub (hub.forwardfooding.com) to provide additional engagement opportunities with our existing and prospective customers
Required skills and experience for the role:
- 4-6+ years in BD role (innovation consultancy or equivalent)
- Recent and direct experience in sales/business development roles
- Passionate about food tech and innovation to improve of our food system
- Initiative to research and uncover new methods and approaches (growth hacking)
- Superior attention to details, organizational skills, and a positive, energetic attitude
- Experience using different tech tools for improving sales effectiveness (eg. CRM, lead generation tools)

So you know what we need, now a little more about who you are:
@ Organised, numeric and systematic in all of your work
@ You're excited by new challenges every day
@ You're a self-starter who can deliver with minimum guidance and support
@ You're passionate about foodtech and innovation with an existing network of food&beverage-related startups, and obsessed about learning the latest about FoodTech

The Forward Fooding Team

Forward Fooding is the world's first collaborative platform for the food and beverage industry. We believe entrepreneurship can make a difference in solving some of biggest issues that are affecting our current food system that's why at Forward Fooding we are passionate about fostering food innovation by connecting food and foodtech entrepreneurs with the most relevant partners for their ventures. To learn more visit: www.forwardfooding.com

jobs.title: Marketing Internship
jobs.description:
Forward Fooding is the world's first collaborative platform for the food and beverage industry. We believe entrepreneurship can make a difference in solving some of biggest issues that are affecting our current food system that's why at Forward Fooding we are passionate about fostering food innovation by connecting food and foodtech entrepreneurs with the most relevant partners for their ventures. To learn more visit: www.forwardfooding.com


The company is populated with young and entrepreneurial creative individuals that form the core of our team. We work hard but enjoy our work and find time to make it fun. There is great potential for personal and professional development for talented and motivated individuals. We're looking for people who want to support and be a key catalyser of the next growth chapter of Forward Fooding as a young and dynamic organization and be part of its exciting future. 

What you will be in charge of:
- Support the development of an outstanding marketing strategy for promoting Forward Fooding's activities and implement it from start-to-finish
- Shape up and maintain Forward Fooding's editorial calendar while developing quality content for our blog and ensure a great user experience
- Campaign management and optimization across multiple channels including social media, SEO and reporting of all digital reach and acquisition channels
- Amplification of content for our websites, blogs, press, email marketing & social media (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube & more)
- Events & community management: support in the organization of workshops, FoodTech meetups and corporate events within our Food & FoodTech Innovation Hub (hub.forwardfooding.com)

Required skills and experience for the role:
- A working knowledge of the blogging ecosystem relevant to the F&B and FoodTech startup field
- Recent and direct experience in digital/performance marketing
- Passionate about campaign optimization and continuous improvement
- Initiative to research and uncover new methods and approaches (growth hacking)
- Superior attention to details, organizational skills, and a positive, energetic attitude
- Experience in using different marketing automation tools (eg. Hootsuite)

So you know what we need, now a little more about who you are:
@ Organized, numeric and systematic in all of your work
@ You're excited by new challenges every day
@ You're a self-starter who can deliver with minimum guidance and support
@ You're passionate about food innovation, food&beverage-related startups, and obsessed about learning the latest about FoodTech

Should the above sound like you then we would love to hear from you

The Forward Fooding Team
